items.titolo: OpenAI Is Nuking Its 4o Model. China’s ChatGPT Fans Aren’t OK
items.descrizione: As OpenAI removed access to GPT-4o in its app on Friday, people who have come to rely on the chatbot for companionship are mourning the loss all over the world.

items.titolo: Chrome testa i “Progetti”: schede e chat Gemini nello stesso posto
items.descrizione: Chrome potrebbe presto organizzare le tab verticali in Progetti, che combinano le schede correlate e le chat con Gemini. The post Chrome testa i “Progetti”: schede e chat Gemini nello stesso posto appeared first on Punto

items.titolo: Anthropic promises to pay for electricity price increases due to it's AI data centers — firm to pay 100% of its grid infrastructure costs, produce new power sources as sector predicted to hit 50 GW in coming years
items.descrizione: The company says that it will pay for the infrastructure upgrades needed for its power demand and that it will also find new sources to keep electricity prices down for the average consumer.
